column1: | jose emeterio martinez1915-2015. jose emeterio martinez passed away june 11
column3: after reaching the age of 100 years. he was born march 10
column6: son of froilan and maria ester alire martinez. jose served in world war ii in the united states army. after many years he retired as a maintenance supervisor at the university of cal davis. he enjoyed camping and fishing. he is survived by his two sons and three daughters; his siblings adelita manzanares
column10: nieces and nephews. he was preceded in death by his parents and one son. memorial services will be held at 11:00 a. m. on friday
column15: utah. care entrusted to lindquists bountiful mortuary. condolences may be shared at www. lindquistmortuary. com the family wants to thank the staff of the east side second floor for the special care shown to jose.
